article_text: The federal government ruled that PR firm Salter Mitchell’s work with Florida Health Choices posed a conflict of interest because of its contract with the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Florida Health Choices, Salter Mitchell, healthcare.gov, Affordable Care Act, Medicaid
article_metadata.title: Feds tell PR firm not to promote Florida health exchange | Miami Herald
